# Contributing to ModdersOmni

Thanks for your interest in contributing to ModdersOmni!

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/modify.git`
3. Create a branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name`
4. Make your changes
5. Run tests to make sure everything passes
6. Commit your changes: `git commit -m "Add your feature"`
7. Push to your fork: `git push origin feature/your-feature-name`
8. Open a Pull Request

## Development Setup

See the [README](../README.md) for setup instructions using Docker or manual installation.

## Code Style

### Backend (Python)
- Follow PEP 8
- Use type hints
- Format with `black`
- Lint with `ruff`

### Frontend (Angular/TypeScript)
- Follow the Angular style guide
- Use Angular CLI for generating components/services
- Format with Prettier

## Reporting Issues

- Use the GitHub issue templates (Bug Report or Feature Request)
- Include reproduction steps for bugs
- Check existing issues before creating a new one

## Pull Request Guidelines

- Keep PRs focused on a single change
- Include tests for new functionality
- Update documentation if needed
- Reference related issues in the PR description
